instruction: Construct a decision tree to classify different types of animals.
output: A decision tree to classify different types of animals would have the main root node asking if the animal is a mammal. If answer is yes, then the next question would be if it has legs or not. If the answer is no, the next question be if it has feathers. This can be further extended with nodes branching out to other questions like whether it is active during the day, has wings, can fly, etc.
